query.name: com.company.product.school.school_calendar
query.description: School calendar for a specified school and year
query.sql: select cal.date_value, to_char(cal.date_value,'DAY'), cyc.letter, cal.a, cal.b, cal.c, cal.d, cal.e, cal.f, cal.insession, cal.schoolid, t.yearid + 1990 from calendar_day cal inner join cycle_day cyc on cyc.id = cal.cycle_day_id inner join schools sch on sch.school_number = cal.schoolid inner join terms t on t.schoolid = cal.schoolid and t.isyearrec=1 and t.firstday <= cal.date_value and cal.date_value <= t.lastday where cal.schoolid = :schoolid and t.yearid + 1990 = :schoolyear order by cal.date_value
